This website contains the results of RFID data analysis

Outcome variables;

1. Introduce widely (Agree/not agree)
2. Against RFID (Not against/ Against)

Explanatory variables;

1. Work experience (<10yrs/ >10 yrs)
2. Specialty
3. Seen other system
4. Know about RFID system
5. Heard of identification systems


Results tables can be found in following link `r "\U261F"``
